entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
